newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: RESEARCH ALERT - Jardine puts buy on S.Lanka blue chips.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Jardine puts buy on S.Lanka blue chips.

text.p: Brokerage Jardine Fleming HNB said on Friday it was upgrading three Sri Lanka blue chips to "buy" from "hold" after they posted improved profits for the year to March 1997.
Hayleys Ltd, Aitken Spence & Co and Central Finance Ltd, have all been upgraded after profits for the financial year ended March 31, 1997 were "above expectations", the brokerage said on Friday.

Hayleys Ltd, which saw net profits rise 32.5 percent to 283.15 million rupees in the financial year ended March 31, 1997, is expected to see its profits increase to 326 million rupees in 1998 and 382 million rupees in 1999, Jardine Fleming said.

Aitken Spence's results for the same period rose 19 percent to 102.56 million rupees and Jardine Fleming forecast profits for the years to March 1998 and 1999 to be 148 million rupees and 193 million respectively.
Central Finance, which saw a profit growth of 39 percent to 158.6 million rupees, is expected to see its net rise to 182 million rupees in 1998 and 211 million in the next year, it said.
